summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4576 for the improvement of the alley in blocks 4 and 5, Queen Anne 2nd Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue West and 8th Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West McGraw Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53409, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
